content.raw:
Open the model editor. Create a model, save and exit.

Select the new model.

Without deselecting the model, go to the Insert Model tab and insert a model. Then click on the new model

On this step, I observe that both models are highlighted with a bounding box (the old one should have been de-highlighted). If I click on one, sometimes I can deselect the other, but then Gazebo crashes. If both are highlighted and I spawn a new simple shape, the new shape will get selected and the others will be deselected.

@chapulina, @iche033, any ideas?
